definition: zircon (colored crystal of zirconium silicate ZrSiO4)
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Therefore, zircon jewelry also gives the meaning of success.
sentences.chinese: 因此鋯石首飾也就賦予了成功的含義。

sentences.english: Zircon is most brittle than other gem materials.
sentences.chinese: 鋯石比其他寶石材料的脆性高。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the way to prepare high-pure zirconia from zirkite .
sentences.chinese: 介紹瞭如何從斜鋯石精礦製備高純二氧化鋯。

sentences.english: Zircon in the Langshan granite is of multi-generation.
sentences.chinese: 狼山花崗岩中鋯石具有多世代性。

sentences.english: Zircons in the rocks were exposed to the same conditions.
sentences.chinese: 這些岩石中的鋯石也暴露在同樣的環境中。

sentences.english: The dating of these zircons indicates that they can be divided into two groups according to their ages.
sentences.chinese: 定年結果表明，變質英安巖中鋯石具有兩組年齡。

sentences.english: Today, Earth teems with thousands of kinds of minerals, from agates to zircons .
sentences.chinese: 今天，地球充滿從瑪瑙到鋯石等成千上萬種礦物。

sentences.english: The merits and demerits of fused quartz and ZrO_2 as refractory were compared.
sentences.chinese: 對比了熔融石英和鋯石的優缺點。

sentences.english: Zircon is one of the minerals which can be used as gemstones.
sentences.chinese: 鋯石是一種可用作寶石的礦物。

sentences.english: The distribution of ancient zircons provided additional evidence.
sentences.chinese: 古鋯石的分佈也提供了其他的證據。

sentences.english: Mingxi, Fujian, is a typical location of zircon megacrysts related to volcanic rocks in China.
sentences.chinese: 福建明溪是我國和火山岩有關的鋯石巨晶的典型產地。

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
